name: potol
description: Every 500 gm of the product will contain 20-25 pcs of Potol(Pointed Gourd).Potol generally collected from locally source. Potol which is known as a Pointed gourd. Pointed gourd is a very tasty vegetable as well as cheap. Various kind of dishes can be made by Pointed gourd like boiled for stews or soups, cooked as curries or fries, and many more. There are many health benefits of eating Pointed gourd. The vegetable is rated as one of the nutritious foods and is offering vitamins like vitamin A, vitamin B1, vitamin B2 and vitamin C. Calcium provides pointed gourd also offers you very less calories and hence it helps to keep the cholesterol levels in control.

name: potato regular
description: Buy regular potato from us which provides you with dietary fiber, potassium, vitamins, etc. Regular potato provides 9-10 percent of your daily need. Regular potatoes offer more of this nutrient which helps control your blood pressure. Make a good curry with regular potato. You can make French fries and you can enjoy with your family members.

name: premium roast chicken
description: This is processed and packaged by Chaldal's processing plant. The hygiene is well maintained and the halal way is maintained.

name: premium beef bone
description: Introducing our Premium Beef, sourced from oxen aged 2 to 4 years, this delicacy is the perfect blend of flavor and nutrition. With 80% meat and only 20% bone and fat, you can expect tender and juicy cuts of beef with every bite. Experience the richness of well-marbled meat that is sure to elevate your cooking experience. Order now and taste the difference of Premium Beef!

name: premium mrigel fish
description: Mrigel is a carp fish. Its one of the popular fish after Rui fish. It is different for its sweet taste and has Avery unique flavour. Chaldal is offering Best Mrigel cultured with healthy and safe farming practise. In this pack we are offering Medium Sized Mrigel fish which 2000gm to 2500 gm weight while its live. Each pack is 500gm which contains 7 to 11 pieces of fish steak. All of our fishes are processed by our experts and washed with clean water.

name: Malta
description: Every 1 kg of the product will contain 5pcs-6pcs of Malta. Malta, a variety of orange, is a popular citrus fruit cultivated in hot climate. The fruit is rich in mineral salts and other ingredients of nutritive value such as iron, lime, phosphorus, and vital minerals. Malta is loaded with vitamin C and vitamin B complex. It is a round-shaped, medium-sized fruit, weighting an average of 145.8 gm. It has a rough-surfaced orange ringed with a segment of around 9.67 centimeters and a sweet-tasting juice content of around 33.7 per cent. The fruit is often used to make processed juice, jam, jelly and marmalade

name: Guava Premium
description: Every 1 kg of the product will contain 3pcs-4pcs of Guava. Guava is a tropical fruit rich in high-profile nutrients. Thai guavas are generally the size of a softball with apple green skin that can range from bumpy to smooth. The flesh is white with pale yellow seeds and tends to be drier than the pink type of guavas. Thai guavas are only mildly sweet and have very little fragrance. The crunchy flesh and hard seeds are both edible. Guavas come in two broad groups divided by the color of their flesh: pink and white. Thai guavas are a group of guavas within the white category that include a number of varieties. Thai Guava Guava is very helpful for those who want to lose weight without compromising their intake of proteins, vitamins and fiber. Guava is very high in roughage and rich in vitamins, proteins and minerals Adding a medium-sized guava to your lunch and you will not feel hungry again until the evening.

name: Rupchanda Fortified Soyabean Oil
description: First Vitamin A fortified Soyabean Oil. Increases immunity. Strengthens bone & teeth.

name: Radhuni Pure Mustard Oil
description: Radhuni Pure Mustard Oil is manufactured from the finest grade of indigenous mustard seeds and purified in fully automated plant.

name: Pran Hot Tomato Sauce
description: Radhuni Pure Mustard Oil is manufactured from the finest grade of indigenous mustard seeds and purified in fully automated plant.

name: Starship Milk Powder
description: Introducing Starship Milk Powder, a versatile and nutritious dairy product conveniently packaged in a 500 gm container. This milk powder offers a convenient solution for incorporating the goodness of milk into your daily routine, whether for drinking, cooking, or baking. Starship Milk Powder is a nutritional powerhouse crafted from high-quality milk that has been carefully processed into a powder form. This preservation method retains the essential nutrients found in milk, including calcium, protein, and vitamins, making it a valuable addition to a balanced diet.

name: Kinder Joy (Boys)
description: Kinder Joy is a delicious treat that comes with a surprise toy. It presents a yummy and entertaining world for kids, while delivering a reassuring and emotional experience to parents. This unique treat comes in a well-designed portion size, which has a dual taste of milky cream made of high quality cows milk and yummy cocoa cream with two crunchy wafer bites filled with cocoa cream. The surprise toys come in a wide range and can be assembled, hence feeding the kid's longing for surprise and play.

name: Sprite Can (Imported)
description: Crisp, refreshing and clean-tasting, Sprite is the worldâ€™s leading lemon and lime-flavoured soft drink. Ingredients: Carbonated Water, Sugar, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Acidity Regulator (Sodium Gluconate), Natural Lemon-Lime Flavourings, Sweetener (Steviol Glycosides).
